Ad Text:
Delivery Centric is seeking a highly skilled SAC Analytics Consultant to lead the design, development, and deployment of advanced SAP Analytics solutions. This role involves end-to-end implementation of SAC Planning modules across CAPEX, OPEX, Revenue, HR, and Depreciation, including complex modeling, story creation, and integration with SAP S/4HANA, BW4HANA, SAP Datasphere, and external third-party data sources. The ideal candidate combines deep SAP expertise with a proactive, quality-driven mindset, ensuring high-impact analytics solutions that support informed business decisions and strategic planning.

Key Responsibilities

Lead the implementation of SAC Analytics solutions, including planning modules for CAPEX, OPEX, Revenue, HR, and Depreciation.
Design, develop, and deploy SAC Analytics models, encompassing data acquisition, modeling, story creation, and content transport network.
Perform complex SAC modeling using advanced formulas, scripting, and best practices for planning and analytics.
Integrate SAC solutions with SAP S/4HANA, BW4HANA, SAP Datasphere, and external 3rd-party data sources via import or live connections.
Deploy SAC solutions using SAP Datasphere on SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP), ensuring seamless data integration and accurate reporting.
Implement SAP BPC analytical reporting solutions (Classic & Embedded) where needed.
Collaborate with business and technical stakeholders, translating complex data and analytics concepts into actionable insights for non-technical audiences.
Maintain high-quality standards, performance optimization, and adherence to best practices in planning data and analytics.
Mentor junior team members and contribute to knowledge sharing across analytics projects.
Qualifications & Skills

8+ years of SAP experience, including S/4 HANA and BW4HANA.
At least 1 greenfield SAC Analytics implementation experience.
Hands-on expertise with SAC Planning modules and SAP BPC analytical reporting solutions.
Strong experience in complex SAC modeling, story creation, and advanced formulas/scripting.
Knowledge of finance and capital planning is an added advantage.
Experience with data modeling, integration, and deployment using SAP Datasphere on SAP BTP.
Excellent communication, collaboration, and stakeholder engagement skills.
Proactive, self-motivated, and quality-focused mindset with strong attention to detail.

At Delivery Centric, you will work on strategically important SAP Analytics projects that drive business value and insight. Collaborate with talented professionals, shape enterprise-level planning and reporting solutions, and expand your expertise in SAC, SAP BPC, and SAP Datasphere. Deliver high-impact analytics outcomes while growing your career in a supportive, innovative, and dynamic environment.

We are looking for an experienced and analytical Business Analyst to support the implementation and continuous improvement of IT Operational and Service Management processes. A key focus of this role is applying knowledge of Service Integration and Management (SIAM) principles to ensure cohesive service delivery across multiple internal and external service providers.

Working at the intersection of business and technology, you will engage stakeholders, gather and refine requirements, and translate these into effective solutions that align with ITSM and SIAM best practices. This is an exciting opportunity to help shape and optimise service delivery in a complex, multi-supplier environment.

1 x 6 month opportunity and 1 x 12 month opportunity are available. 

 

Key Responsibilities

Engage with stakeholders to gather, refine, and document requirements using interviews, workshops, workflow analysis, and more

Conduct business process reviews and identify opportunities for improvement or automation

Evaluate proposed system solutions with developers to ensure alignment with business and service expectations

Prepare and execute test plans and scripts, working closely with the Test Manager to ensure quality delivery

Document business requirements, process flows, user stories, and system specifications

Collaborate with subject matter experts to ensure solution design supports SIAM-aligned service integration

Analyse data relationships, service dependencies, and communication flows across multiple service providers

Recommend and assess new systems or features to improve multi-vendor service outcomes

Support the design and optimisation of end-to-end service delivery models under SIAM governance

Develop comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials

Contribute to the evaluation and implementation of new tools and technologies

Provide accurate and timely reporting to management and project stakeholders

 

Skills & Experience Required

5+ years’ experience as a Business Analyst within IT Operations or Service Delivery

Proven experience in Service Integration and Management (SIAM) environments

Strong understanding of multi-supplier service management models, service boundaries, and interface points

Experience working with service management frameworks such as ITIL and SIAM

Ability to document and analyse end-to-end services, identifying integration points and process gaps

Skilled in functional business analysis, including requirements elicitation and process automation

Excellent communication skills with experience facilitating workshops and stakeholder discussions

Demonstrated ability to bridge business needs and technical solutions

Experience with ITSM tools, data modelling, and system testing

Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (including Excel, Visio, PowerPoint)

Experience in developing reports and dashboards for operational and service performance tracking

Strong organisational skills and the ability to manage changing priorities

AGSVA Baseline Security Clearance (mandatory)

Exposure to project methodologies and tools such as PRINCE2, Agile, or PMBOK

 

Desirable Skills

Understanding of SIAM roles and responsibilities, such as Service Integrator, Service Provider, and Retained Organisation

Familiarity with governance structures, performance monitoring, and cross-provider collaboration models

Experience working in or with federated IT environments or large government/shared services organisations

Exposure to service catalogue development, service level management, and contractual interface requirements

Please apply now.
